name: @feathers-x/cli
description: The command line interface for managing Feathers applications.

scripts.publishx: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && npm publish --access restricted --tag pre
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access restricted
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access restricted
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish --access restricted
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
